page.title: 15Grange Farm at Owston
page.content: At{Grange Farm}in{Owston}the farmer grows lots of things like wheat,barley and grass.The farmer keeps cows and the reason he keeps them is because he sells the milk.The farmer owns lots of land.He owns 160 acres and he uses 140 acres for his crops.The farmer has about 10 acres of land not in use at the moment which is woodland.He doesn't keep sheep and the reason why he doesn't is because the land is too wet for them.He has a big vegetable garden for himself so he doesn't have to go miles to the shops for his food. The farmer has some domestic animals. He's got some dogs,some cats and he keeps poultry.He sells the wheat and barley.The farmer has a big orchard.
